post.author: jstier
post.body:
Hi,

I was wondering if anyone has some md5 models that I could use to demo the Geist3D (http://www.geist3d.com) graphics engine?
As far as I know I cannot use the doom3 models. They are copyright, right ?

I want to put the character in front of the house in this video clip http://www.geist3d.org/movies/movie1.avi.
Of course I will properly credit the artist.


Cheers
